pages.title: Gravity
pages.text: Naturally occurring blocks (dirt, grass, stone, gravel, sand) are affected by gravity. This means that without a proper support system, these blocks will fall, and you will not be able to create walls or ceilings out of these blocks.

pages.title: Support Beams
pages.text: Any fance can be used as proper support beam. $(br2)Support beams will improve the stability and prevent rock from fracturing in the range of 16 blocks.
